"T: Destroyers of Light":
"This is an urgent message for the Guardian.
We've detected unusual Ether readings
indicating the manifestation of giant
Phantoms on the Moon and on Earth.
You must face them alone, using all your
power to destroy them. This will be a
dangerous mission, but you must succeed.
――――――――――――――――――――
Damage Limit: 999999
Failure: Fail objective, time limit expires."

"Now starting the transfer.
Your first objective is to destroy the giant Phantom that has appeared on the Moon."
"Be ready to destroy the target as soon as you see it! And please, be careful!"
"Next, you'll be transferred to the location of a giant reading that has suddenly appeared on Earth."

"This will be a tough fight, but I know that you'll make it through!
Please, be careful!"
